comment.author: 29050464@N06
comment._content: Added to en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Kyohei_Inukai Oops, wrong guy, see commons.wikimedia.org/wiki/File:Kyohei_Inukai.jpg Thanks for posting these!

comment.author: 44959668@N02
comment._content: I did some restoration work on the image at upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/0/09/Kyohei_Inukai... and created an article for the proper Kyohei at en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Kyohei_Inukai_(b_1890) , though it is still a stub. Are there any sources anywhere that would be useful?

comment.author: 44959668@N02
comment._content: Sorry you probably want this version of the image page commons.wikimedia.org/wiki/File:Kyohei_Inukai.jpg

comment.author: 29050464@N06
comment._content: Sadads, thanks for cleaning up the image! And starting a page for this gentleman. For the article, see www.free-press-release.com/news-autobiography-of-a-painte... Susannah, please see commons.wikimedia.org/wiki/File:Kyohei_Inukai.jpg -- you may want to copy Sadads' version to your archive. Best regards, Pete Tillman

comment.author: 25053835@N03
comment._content: Thank you for your enthusiasm regarding Smithsonian photography, Pete and Sadads! I do appreciate you posting these additional links and information. This image belongs in the Smithsonian American Art Museum, Photograph Archives, but I am happy to forward on your interest. Best, Susannah Smithsonian Institution Archives
